ygData.subject: guild
ygData.msgSnippet: I did start a char on the Brell server so that I could join the guild and play with you guys but my friends missed me on the Nife, so I ve been playing there
ygData.messageBody:
I did start a char on the Brell server so that I could join the guild
and play with you guys but my friends missed me on the Nife, so I've
been playing there and don't have time to spend on more than one
character. :(

I heard that there was going to be a quest so that characters could
change servers, but that it was going to be a long and involved quest
so that only the people who really want to change servers will actually
complete it. I'm not sure how they are going to go about any conflict
of names that may occur. I heard that from now on, only one person
could have a name regardless of what server they are on so that name
conflict would not occur. I hope they impliment the quest soon, I got a
shaman I really like on a server I don't play on anymore.
